channel.title: Zenith based client need some help here look plz
channel.description:
Ok so im working on the g.e which im struggling with. but i also need some help with other stuff.
are there any Scripted skills that work with a zenith base. for
Dung. Construction Farming. Slayer. and preferably a Complete pouch or Summoning skill>?
Any help is appropriated. and as soon as i get my g.e 100% done i will post it if i can get help with these issues while i work on it.
people keep begging for a fix now. and people arn't very patient. =/
